GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns an article by its id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comment objects ordered my recency or an empty array if article has no comments

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: request must contain username and comment body. request will return comment body
